SummaryEnglish:
Atsushi Kamiya, a former captain at Kakegawa High School and the world-renowned "courageous captain" for a famous Italian soccer team…
And Hideto Tsuji, a student at Kakegawa High School, who seems uninterested in the now-weakened soccer team…
Their meeting is the start of a new legend...

1.SummaryEnglish: Hideto Tsuji is a young man who's given up on soccer after his old team turned against him. But soccer might not have given up on him, as his school's high school team just got a new coach that's a famous former pro player!

2.SummaryEnglish: Hideto is ready to give up on soccer forever when he meets an unexpected friend from his past, Kohei, who's now a top soccer player who played in England. His friend's overjoyed to see him, but can he live up to their expectations?

3.SummaryEnglish: Coach Kamiya is ready to whip the losing Kakegawa team into shape, and he's not afraid to change things to do it. But when he takes one of the team's top players off the starting roster, he faces a revolt on the field.

4.SummaryEnglish: Coach Kamiya has set a tough deadline for the Kakegawa soccer team: they have 1 month to win a game or he's shutting them down. But their first match is a devastating loss, and the only have time to play one more game.

5.SummaryEnglish: Kakegawa plays their first real game against a powerful school who came from out of town to beat them.

6.SummaryEnglish: A star player from Italy shows up to play with the Kakegawa soccer team.

7.SummaryEnglish: It's time for the traditional Kakegawa training camp, and Coach Kamiya is even more excited than the players.

8.SummaryEnglish: The Kakegawa team plays its first game at the qualifiers, and finds itself up against a terrifying puppet master!

9.SummaryEnglish: Tsuji's got closer to his teammates, but at the same time he's made a dangerous enemy.

10.SummaryEnglish: Tsuji quits the team after an article in the newspaper reveals his tormented past.

11.SummaryEnglish: A surprising visit changes the way Tsuji plays soccer forever.

12.SummaryEnglish: The team challenges Kohei in the beginning of the final game before the nationals.

13.SummaryEnglish: Kakegawa faces off against Nomada in the final seconds of the prefectural championships.
